post.body: Read the Hamas charter and then come back and tell me how to negotiate with Hamas: http://tinyurl.com/hn6lr #gaza
Pick me! Pick me! Answer: Because Hamas used civilian areas to hide rockets. For example: see http://tinyurl.com/7xe86t #gaza
Yes - I am aware of honor killings. #gaza
It's called a retweet of a retweet of tweet of a kid who could have been on the receiving end of a Hamas missile misfiring #gaza
LThe Hamas terrorists are getting an up-close-and-personal viewing of the latest weapon technology #gaza
And the CIA have bugged your brain and are listening in to your whining while waterboarding aliens in Roswell #gaza
Original. I like it. I must use this sentence sometime. #gaza
You need to read some more uncensored material that has more fact and less 'woe-is-me' narrative #gaza
Let's face it, Hamas wants to kill Israeli civilians but when attacked it sends its apologists to whine like an old woman #gaza
... Hamas can't even keep a deal with Fatah ... their so-called 'brothers-in-arms'! #gaza
You gotta admit, Israel is better keeping peace deals with Arabs than Hamas does. It's got Egypt and Jordan ... #gaza
Thanks - I forgot to add 'war crimes' to the Hamas apologist drinking game #gaza
You are showing your age. Or lack of it. And knowledge of history. You've forgotten the 90s and so-called second intifada #gaza
Nothing like getting your own personalised tweet ... along with everyone else. #gaza
It's the same picture you tweeted just before. As before, probably one of the many kids killed by Hamas rocket misfires #gaza
Is this one of the many kids killed by the Hamas rockets that misfire? #gaza
Excerpts from Hamas Charter: "Jihad is its path and death for the sake of Allah is the loftiest of its wishes" (Wish being granted) #gaza
Excerpts from Hamas Charter: "The Day of Judgement will not come about until Moslems fight the Jews" #gaza
Have any of the whining-like-an-old-woman Hamas apologists come up with a military target that Hamas is firing upon? #gaza
Sometimes I get the feeling Hamas apologists are playing drinking games. Anytime "massacre" or "occupation" is used, time to drink! #gaza
